extension.description: Receive Important Kobra news and update notifications.
extension.disclaimer: We take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause.

extension.description: Subatomic Duck Wizard allows you to get access to the latest Subatomic Duck Custom Builds.
[COLOR lime][I]KOBRA[/I][/COLOR][COLOR ghostwhite] TUBE[/COLOR]is the official YouTube channel for Kobra Builds. Here you can find tutorials and preview videos.

[COLOR lime][I]KOBRA[/I][/COLOR][COLOR ghostwhite] WIZARD[/COLOR] provides easy access to [I]Kobra[/I] builds at the click of a button. The wizard also provides [I]Kobra[/I] custom packs to enable the user to customize the build to their own taste. [I]Kobra[/I] App Installer and [I]Kobra[/I] Tube are also included with the [I]Kobra[/I] Wizard. No addons are distributed with [I]Kobra[/I] builds. You will be asked if you would like to download each addons as you click on main menu and sub menu items. Thanks to all Devs who have contributed to this project!

[COLOR lime][I]KOBRA[/I][/COLOR][COLOR ghostwhite] INSTALLER[/COLOR] is a third party Kodi add-on. Browse through the most popular Android apps on the market and install them with ease from within Kodi. Browse and download popular roms and rom packs. Browse and install popular emulators. Browse and install adult apps.
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon takes no responsibilty for any content viewed via these applications or any damage caused by use of of these applications.
